artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Printer: Kozensai; Author: Poem by Koizumi Jingairō; Author: Poem by Ichikawa Danjūrō VII
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: poem by Jingairō | poem by Danjūrō: {Yoi ni naki yonaka ni tataku nanakusa mo kore de nido taru aa tsuga mo nee} (The seven herbs cry in the evening and are beaten at night, too; once more he exclaims: \'Utterly ridiculous\'; transl. by Roger Keyes)
markings: red artist\'s Mimasu seal; LRC printer\'s seal: 摺工小善 {surikō Kozen}
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
signed: 五渡亭國貞画 {Gototei Kunisada ga}
text: Right sheet of a diptych. Related to the plav Gohiiki tsuwamono no majiwari 御贔屓竹馬友達, performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1822, eleventh month.
title: Actors Ichikawa Danjūrō VII and Bandō Zenji III
